library.controllers

Class AvailabilityController

  • java.lang.Object
    • library.controllers.BaseController<Availability>
      • library.controllers.AvailabilityController

  • public class AvailabilityController
extends BaseController<Availability>
    This class is the controller for the Availability model , it will take the requests from the view to get the objects in the model and will call the file handler to save the objects in the cache memory (Models In Memory)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AvailabilityController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addReaderToQueue(java.lang.String bookId, java.lang.String readerId)
      add the Reader to the queue and refresh the memory, will throw exceptions, if reader is already in queue or if the reader already have the book but the program will keep running smoothly
      Availability[] getAll()
      returns all the availabilities in the cache memory
      Availability getById(java.lang.String id)
      gets the availability in the cache by the ID
      protected BaseFileHandler<Availability> getFileHandler()
      returns the file handler responsible for this object
      Availability[] loadFile()
      This method calls the the file handler, loads the file, with the Availabilities gets the readers by the Id in the CSV Column and enqueue them into the queue of the availability object and loads the array with all the objects into the Cache Memory ( Models In Memory )
      void removeFirstReaderFromQueue(java.lang.String bookId)
      will dequeue the first reader in the queue

      • Methods inherited from class library.controllers.BaseController

        add, edit, writeFile

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
